mapper.select: SELECT d.*, dc.name AS categoryName FROM sc_dictionary d JOIN sc_dictionary_category dc ON d.category_key = dc.key WHERE d.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE sc_dictionary SET `key` = #{key}, `value` = #{value}, comment = #{comment}, seq = #{seq}, status = #{status}, category_key = #{categoryKey}, icon = #{icon}, color = #{color}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sc_dictionary SET `lock` = #{lock}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
